title: Manikyam & Kundan Jadau Long Haaram - Timeless Telugu Splendor
materials: South Sea Pearls. Traditional Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Intricately handcrafted Jadau setting showcases the beauty of Kundan stones. The necklace features alternating emerald (Manikyam) accents within the floral motifs, offering a striking contrast. South Sea pearl drops enhance the necklace's grace. The pendant features a traditional floral design embellished with kundans and centered with a captivating rectangular-cut emerald. The floral designs are inspired by Mughal art.
occasions: or any occasion where a touch of regal elegance is desired.
description: This Jadau Haaram is a masterpiece of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The combination of Kundan, Emerald, and Pearls offers a timeless appeal. The 22K gold provides lasting value, making it an heirloom piece to be cherished for generations. A statement piece suitable for the modern bride who appreciates cultural heritage.
